policy.name: Policy for service #16711686, RoutingExtensions
policy.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy"> <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required"> <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion> <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="http://hugh:8081/RoutingExtensionsTest"/> <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included"> <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="Cookie"/> </L7p:item> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="SOAPAction"/> </L7p:item> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="Content-Type"/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Rules> </L7p:RequestHeaderRules> <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included"> <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/> <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/> </L7p:RequestParamRules> <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included"> <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/> </L7p:item> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/> <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="header insert"/> <L7p:Name stringValue="header insert"/> </L7p:item> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:Name stringValue="resHeader 1"/> </L7p:item> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/> <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="modified resHeader 2"/> <L7p:Name stringValue="resHeader 2"/> </L7p:item> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/> <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="${request.http.uri}"/> <L7p:Name stringValue="request.http.uri"/> </L7p:item> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/> <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="${request.url}"/> <L7p:Name stringValue="resHeader 3"/> </L7p:item> <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included"> <L7p:UsesCustomizedValue booleanValue="true"/> <L7p:CustomizeValue stringValue="${auditLevel}"/> <L7p:Name stringValue="resHeader 4"/> </L7p:item> </L7p:Rules> </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules> </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion> </wsp:All> </wsp:Policy>
